main event: On August 14, 1952, two persons in Constantine observed a luminous object flying at high speed toward Guelma.
interesting points: The object emitted a very bright light and had no resemblance to a flying saucer., At 1920 hours on the same day, many people in Philippeville reported seeing an enormous red disk leaving a greenish trail., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The local weather bureau did not launch any weather balloons at the time of the sighting., The record indicates this was part of the Project Blue Book investigation.
